data.title: I Ought to be in Pictures
data.meta_description: By Neil Simon Directed by David Guthrie Produced by Kelli Harless and Andrew Lukes   Herb, a Hollywood scriptwriter currently “at liberty” is surprised when his forgotten past reap…
data.text:
By Neil Simon

Directed by David Guthrie

Produced by Kelli Harless and Andrew Lukes

Herb, a Hollywood scriptwriter currently “at liberty” is surprised when his forgotten past reappears in the form of Libby, a teenage daughter who has trekked from Brooklyn with dreams of movie stardom. With Steffy, his sometime paramour at his side, Herb decides to take another stab at fatherhood and hopefully this time, get it right.

February 16-March 11, 2018 Fridays-Saturdays at 8 pm, Sundays at 2 pm, at Patio Playhouse

Patio Playhouse Theater 116 S Kalmia Street, Escondido, CA 92025

Between Vinz Wine Bar and Continental Deli

Press Kit
